pullrequest.title: Add spring_reference and spring_stiffness tags to joint axis dynamics

content.raw:
It was part of my plan to try to help gazebo not fail if using sdformat 2.0.0. By setting `required=1`, the non-existence of these tags in a model is a flag that sdformat is too old.

As an alternative, we could release sdformat 2.0.1 after this tag is added and require gazebo 3.1 to use sdformat 2.0.1 or later.
content.html:
It was part of my plan to try to help gazebo not fail if using sdformat 2.0.0. By setting required=1, the non-existence of these tags in a model is a flag that sdformat is too old.

As an alternative, we could release sdformat 2.0.1 after this tag is added and require gazebo 3.1 to use sdformat 2.0.1 or later.
